thread.title_full: Eleos Technologies Introduces New Pricing - Eliminates Document Scanning Charges

author: Wes Pollock
title: Eleos Technologies Introduces Pricing - Eliminates Document Scanning Charges
text:
Eleos Technologies, LLC, the leading provider of mobile apps for trucking fleets today announced new pricing that eliminates document scanning charges. Trucking companies who power their drivers’ mobile apps with the Eleos Mobile Platform can now enjoy simple usage-based pricing with no up-front capital investment and no scanning charges. Kevin Survance, CEO of Eleos, says that offering free document scanning is possible due to the efficiency of the company’s technology and the rapid commoditization of document scanning. "We’re proud to usher in a new era in which it’s no longer necessary to pay $.05/page to capture trip documents from drivers. Eleos has developed the industry’s most efficient systems for image processing and we’re delighted that our customers benefit from this engineering achievement.”
Acclaimed for its unparalleled power and flexibility, the Eleos Mobile Platform offers the world’s most comprehensive integrated solution for driver/fleet communication. The Eleos Mobile Platform currently powers mobile apps for some the world’s most successful trucking companies. For more information, visit http://eleostech.com .
About Eleos Technologies, LLC
Eleos Technologies, LLC, based in Greenville, South Carolina, is a mobile technology company focused on truck driver communication solutions. Eleos takes pride in helping trucking companies design, deploy, and operate intelligent mobile apps for their drivers.
For more information about this topic, or to schedule an interview with Kevin Survance, email press(at)eleostech.com or call (855) 953-2953.
